name: organic-oval
description: organic frontend components as custom html tags

scripts.test: npm run test-style && mocha --compilers js:babel-register --require ./tests/setup.js tests/**/*.test.js
scripts.release-patch: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm version patch && git push origin develop && git checkout master && git pull origin master && git pull origin develop && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master && git checkout develop
scripts.release-minor: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm version minor && git push origin develop && git checkout master && git pull origin master && git pull origin develop && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master && git checkout develop
scripts.release-major: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm version major && git push origin develop && git checkout master && git pull origin master && git pull origin develop && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master && git checkout develop

author: Camplight
